excerpt: A colorful and protein-packed salad that will tantalize your taste buds.

instructions.name: Cook quinoa
instructions: In a medium saucepan, combine quinoa and 2 cups (475ml) water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cover.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes until quinoa is tender and water is absorbed.
Remove from heat and let cool.

instructions.name: Make dressing
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, maple syrup, and garlic.

instructions.name: Assemble salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, fresh parsley, fresh mint, and chickpeas.
Drizzle with dressing and toss well to combine.
Serve immediately or store in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
